title: [*] Security - Upgrade `acorn` dependencies to patch vulnerabilities

nodes.bodyText: @jeffladiray This approach (merge security patch PR by dependabot) has been validated by @arnaudbesnier for this PR (private Slack)

title: Bump minimist from 1.2.0 to 1.2.2

nodes.bodyText: Looks like minimist is no longer updatable, so this is no longer needed.
